message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I take a bit more considering the inflation rate affects me more.
Your rate is higher, so I need a bigger cut to make this worthwhile. Let's be fair.
This is barely better than your last offer, Bob. I need a better incentive to accept.
Okay, Bob, let's meet in the middle. This offer considers the inflation but is still advantageous for me.
This is getting ridiculous. We're both losing out. Let's split it evenly and call it a day.
Alright, Bob. A 50/50 split it is. Let's not risk losing everything.
